utter_chitchat/ask_building_history.text: This building is located in the 22@ District of Barcelona, an old industrial part of the city that has been renewed with self-sufficient technological buildings. It's part of the old 'Can Framis' factory block, which used to consist of two industrial buildings.

utter_chitchat/ask_building_name.text: This is the Tànger building of University Pompeu Fabra

utter_chitchat/ask_building_address.text:
The address of this building is Tànger, 122-140 08018 Barcelona. You can get here by:
 Metro: Line 1 Glòries
 Tram: T4 Glòries (Ca l'Aranyó) - T5 and T6 Glòries (La Farinera)
 Bus: H14, B25, B20, 192, 92, 42, 40, 7, 6

utter_chitchat/ask_room.text: If you're looking for a meeting room, we do have the Tanger room on the first floor. It can accommodate up to 44 people. You can book it through the link: https://egp.upf.edu/jira/servicedesk/customer/portal/12/create/344

utter_chitchat/ask_restroom.text: Restrooms are located on the southwest side of each floor, next to the elevators
